item.title: Developing Custom Processors using OpenTelemetry in .NET 8
item.description: Introduction In the ever developing landscape of modern software development, observability has emerged as a crucial aspect of building and maintaining robust applications. OpenTelemetry, a Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) project, provides a vendor-neutral set of APIs, libraries, and tools for generating and managing telemetry data, including metrics, logs, and traces. One of the powerful [â€¦] Link to article: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/dotnet/developing-custom-processors-using-opentelemetry-in-net-8/
